select date, data_source as dataSource,
platform_name as platformName,
advertise_active as advertiseActive,
sum(browse_count) as browseCount, sum(click_count) as clickCount, sum(arrive_count) as arriveCount, sum(arrive_user_count) as arriveUserCount, sum(again_count) as againCount, avg(average_stay_time) as averageStayTime from `huaxia_flow_report` where `data_source` = #{dataSource}
and platform_name = #{platformName}
and advertise_active in
'${advertiseActive}'
group by `date`
,`advertise_active`
having `date` >= #{startDate} and `date` <= #{endDate}
order by `date` desc
